data.review: Thanks IIT Kharagpur for great interaction.
Certainly ideas worth spreading! Very inspirational, must watch, great team!
Everything was Fab. Well managed. A li'l improvement in the technical part would be better :) Kudos to ur team :)
Very inspiring talks. A great experience and looking forward to future editions.
works really well , well managed and the talks were all really inspiring !! YO _ TEDx!!
A great opportunity! Having a great experience... Yo_TEDx!
I was a part of the organizing team of TEDxIITKharagpur 2017. It was truly a memorable experience.
